AKB Web Services

AKB Web Services provide development, design and support services around web, mobile and cloud technologies using open source solutions and open standards. We are based in Perth, Western Australia and were established in 2005 by Alex Bergin.

Past projects

Stamp Duty Calculator AU mobile app 2015

This calculator helps you determine the stamp duty that might be due on property purchased in Australia. The application uses the hybrid mobile development framework: Ionic & AngualarJS. Check it out on Google Play or the App Store.

Agweb Intranet 2014

Agweb is the intranet site of the Dept Agriculture & Food, Western Australia. This department has over 1,000 employees across the state using the intranet for policies, news, tools, etc. The Agweb was built in Drupal using over 40 3rd party Drupal modules.

DAFWA Gateway Portal 2013

The DAFWA gateway project was a rebuild of the Dept Agriculture & Food, Western Australia's public facing website. The project's objective was to empower the non-technical staff of DAFWA to easily create, review and publish website content in an accessible, portable and structured format. The DAFWA Gateway went live in January 2014. You can view the website at www.agric.wa.gov.au.

Other projects

  • Western Australian Organism List - Drupal 7.x and Oracle application built in 2012
  • The Monthly Magazine - large (>10,000 nodes, multi platform) Drupal 6.x portal maintained from 2007-2011
  • Australasian Podiatry Council CPD system - Drupal 6.x portal built in 2010-2011
  • Mountway Apartments Perth - Drupal brochure site built in 2010

This website was built with Foundation and FontAwesome. Fork this website from github.com/alexkb/akb.
